Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory669.jpg'}
{3: 'Street vendors are calling out, and laughter is getting louder, revealing a busy thoroughfare brimming with life.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "This is it, but there's such a huge crowd...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'It definitely looks like a snack street.', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Want to go in and explore?', 3: '19'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Alright, I'll guide Commandant through the crowd.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "The data on the terminal says that in moments like this, I should hold on tight to you so you won't get lost.", 4: '1'}
{2: '...Is that advice for taking care of kids?', 3: '22', 4: 'Be careful not to bump into someone.', 5: '22'}
{3: 'No sooner does No. 21 say this than she grabs your hand and pushes deeper into the crowd.'}
{3: "To avoid running into other tourists, you tighten your grip on No. 21's hand and practically get dragged right to a pastry shop."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner A', 3: "Happy Double Seventh—Lovers' Delights for sale!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Mmm... the smell of sesame.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 is leaning against the glass case, blinking at the dazzling array of pastries like a curious little animal.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner A', 3: "Hey there, looking to buy some Lovers' Delights?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Commandant, I want this one!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 is gently swinging your arm back and forth with one hand, while pointing at the pastries behind the glass display with the other. Her eyes sparkle with anticipation.'}
{2: "Hi, I'm buying for two."}
{2: 'Shop Owner A', 3: "Sure thing! That's two servings of Lovers' Delights. Which design are you thinking of?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner A', 3: 'We have peaches, tigers, kittens, birds...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want one with a little wolf.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shop Owner A', 3: "Huh... A wolf? Sorry, kid, but we don't have any wolf designs here.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'No. 21 pouts and lets out a low grumble, sounding a bit annoyed.'}
{2: 'How about something else?', 3: '48', 4: "Food doesn't usually feature wolf designs, you know.", 5: '48'}
{3: 'You say this as you gently rub her head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Then I want a bird. Its wings look like the emblem you wear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want to find out how it tastes.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Okay, let's go with the little bird.", 3: '53', 4: "It's actually a gray raven...", 5: '53'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Mmm, crunchy, and it smells good.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Commandant, have a bite too.', 4: '1'}
{3: "No. 21 sits on a chair outside the shop, pulls out a Lovers' Delight from the bag, and holds it out for you to try."}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "It's a little dry—I still prefer sweet things... Huh?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 sniffs the air like an animal on patrol, scanning the busy, traffic-filled streets.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Sniff... That pungent smell—it's like something's getting burned.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Smells like caramel?', 3: '64'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Sniff sniff. Commandant, over here.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The Construct is still munching on the Lovers' Delights as she holds your hand and leads you to a nearby shop."}
{3: 'Outside, you see sugar art and pastries in all sorts of shapes. When the shopkeeper spots you, he quickly wipes his hands and steps out from the wonderfully aromatic workspace.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner B', 3: 'On-Me Crisp! Care for one, dear customer?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'All right, thanks.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As soon as the shop owner finishes speaking, No. 21 promptly pops a sugar pastry from the stall into her mouth.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shop Owner B', 3: 'Hey! Young lady, you have to pay before you eat!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Huh? Didn\'t you just say it\'s "on me"?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Shop Owner B', 3: 'Well, this pastry is called On-Me Crisp. When we want to attract customers, we just shout "On-Me Crisp!" It\'s a tradition that goes back generations in Kowloong.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Can we customize the shape?', 3: '80'}
{2: 'Shop Owner B', 3: "Of course. If you'd like, you can make it yourself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Commandant, I want to try.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'You pay the shop owner and walk into the workshop with No. 21, where the sweet aroma of sugar greets you at once.'}
{3: 'A small metal pot bubbles with brown liquid, and No. 21, eyes alight with curiosity, nearly sticks her hand right in.'}
{2: "No, don't. It's too hot.", 3: '89', 4: "(Gently take hold of No. 21's wrist)", 5: '89'}
{3: 'To demonstrate properly, you hand No. 21 a metal spoon and guide her to scoop up a spoonful of syrup from the pot, then drizzle it onto the silicone paper.'}
{2: "Let's draw a little wolf together.", 3: '96'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'A little wolf... alright! Commandant, you draw the back, and I do the front.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 keeps a close watch on your every move, carefully scooping spoonful after spoonful of syrup to form the little wolf she imagines.'}
{3: 'You two work briskly on the paper, and before long, a somewhat abstract creature emerges.'}
{2: 'All set.', 3: '102', 4: 'Looks about right, I suppose.', 5: '102'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "...There's still something missing.", 4: '1'}
{3: "With two more spoonfuls of syrup, No. 21 adds a pair of golden wings to the little wolf's back."}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'When a little wolf grows wings, it instantly becomes the most formidable hunter in the forest.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: "I'll name it. This is No. 21 and Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You did a great job.', 3: '116', 4: "(Rub No. 21's head)", 5: '112'}
{3: 'No. 21 happily wiggles her tail-like balance device.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This is something I draw with you. I want to keep it with me at all times.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'This is something I draw with you. I want to keep it with me at all times.', 4: '1'}
{2: "But won't it spoil?", 3: '118', 4: "We can't waste food.", 5: '118'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Then I want to remember its taste forever.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The brownish-red syrup has cooled now, and with your help, No. 21 carefully peels the little wolf off the paper.'}
{3: 'The Construct beams with delight and holds the little wolf aloft. In the late-afternoon sunlight, its golden wings shimmer brilliantly.'}
{3: 'No. 21 runs a few steps ahead, then turns around to look at you lingering behind her.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'There are so many unusual scents over there, Commandant. Come along with me.', 4: '1'}
